name: Cyber Hearts Club
summary: Cyber Hearts Club is an immersive game where players enter the virtual world of the Social Media Club. In this game, you'll have the opportunity to study and navigate the fascinating intricacies of social media, encountering various challenges and characters that enrich the experience. Throughout your journey, you'll make important decisions and discover new ways to interact with the digital community. Cyber Hearts Club blends captivating storytelling with a deep exploration of social media phenomena, providing an UNFORGETTABLE gaming experience.
